name: Arc'teryx Covert 1/2 Zip Pullover - Men's
description: A comfy pull-over with clean lines and technical construction. Acr’teryx’s Covert line offers slick looking outwear that is at home on hut-trips or trips to the corner store. Crafted from a warm heathered fleece, the Covert line is a great choice for cool fall days and layers well when the weather turns truly nasty.Regular fit wears like you want it to, no surprises.Uses Arc’teryx’s Alpenex II™ heathered fleece, a lightweight and breathable fleece that wears well and packs well.Stealthy underarm gussets allow and improved range of movement while keeping with the top’s clean lines.Hand and sleeve pockets give you a secure place to stash necessities.Pockets are laminated with glued in zippers, improving strength and adding durability.Bound cuffs and hemline eliminate the risk of fraying.
